Uses of Package
tophersmith.security.headers.impl

  • Packages that use tophersmith.security.headers.impl 
    Package Description
    tophersmith.security.headers  
    tophersmith.security.headers.impl  
  • Classes in tophersmith.security.headers.impl used by tophersmith.security.headers 
    Class and Description
    AbstractHeader
    Base Abstraction for all headers
  • Classes in tophersmith.security.headers.impl used by tophersmith.security.headers.impl 
    Class and Description
    AbstractHeader
    Base Abstraction for all headers
    ContentSecurityPolicyHeader
    The Content-Security-Policy header is used in response headers to inform the User-Agent from where certain kinds of resources may be loaded.
    StrictTransportSecurityHeader
    The Strict-Transport-Security header is used in response headers inform the browser User-Agent that this site must be communicated with using HTTPS.
    XFrameOptionsHeader
    The X-Frame-Options header is used in response headers to configure which sites may frame this response's resource.
    XXSSProtectionHeader
    The X-XSS-Protection header is used in response headers to require browser User Agents to enable reflective XSS protection.
